intro: Valerianella texana, commonly known as Texas valerian, is a perennial herb native to the southern United States. Its fragrant foliage and clustered flowers make it a distinctive member of its ecological community. Valerianella texana is also noted for its medicinal properties, historically used to treat digestive issues and nervous disorders.
